name: Pi-yinger fled
description:
Pi-Yinger fled (皮影儿跑了) is a 2D action game. 

In this game, there will be only boss fight.

Players can roll, attack and defend to dodge boss's attacks as well as find ways to defeat her.  

Be careful for the second phase. Good Luck!

Up to 2 players are allowed.

developer: YI LUO, JINBIAO WU
